External hard disk

Fast speed and tiny! I use this to store and edit my videos. Saves space on my working laptop.

Phone holder

I never liked the spring-loaded holders that seem to put pressure on my phones. I love this one as it snuggly secures my iPhone with a screw for adjustable tightness.
